#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define M 100005
#define l long
#define FOR(i,a,b) for(l i=(a);i<(b);i++)

using namespace std;
int main()
{
          int t;
          char str[M],sym[M];
          scanf("%d",&t);
          while(t--){
          scanf("%s",str);
          l lc[M],j,count=-1,min_count=M;
          l len=strlen(str);
          FOR(i,0,len)
          {
                    j=i;
                    while(j<len&&str[j]==str[j+1])
                              j++;
                    lc[++count]=j-i+1;
                    sym[count]=str[i];
                    i=j;
          }
          FOR(i,1,count)
          {
                    if(min_count>lc[i]&&sym[i-1]!=sym[i+1])
                              min_count=lc[i];
          }
          min_count+=2;
          cout<<min_count<<endl;
          }
}
